attributes.action: stop local council selling land off
attributes.additional_details: To meet current and future housing need we need to significantly increase the supply of new homes. Most experts believe that we need to build 250,000 new homes per year, whilst over the last decade we have averaged just 130,500 per year.
attributes.background: stop the land grabbed by private developers and individuals for their own personal portfolios

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to prevent local authorities from selling land except for housing if that is what you would like to see happen.
